dialogues.text: Ash enters a derelict sub-sector. The mesh grid flickers beneath cracked glass panels, and glitching human silhouettes fade in and out—frozen mid-movement.

dialogues.speaker: FLUX
dialogues.text: "This is it—old memory storage. Pre-evolution. These aren’t dreams, they’re failed simulations. People SHARD tried to archive... and couldn’t rebuild."

dialogues.speaker: ASH
dialogues.text: "They’re like ghosts stuck in a broken loop."
